result.execSummary:
The defendant Marquis D Mitsanis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Straight time. **Commencing forthwith. The defendant may serve his sentence in Milwaukee County. 44 days credit granted toward balance of sentence.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

District Attorney's Office Law Intern, Jack Rieder, appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Marquis D Mitsanis in court, in custody (by zoom from Milwaukee County Jail), with attorney J Andrew Herbers.    
All parties have agreed that some may have the hearing conducted remotely. This hearing has met the statutory standards for video conferencing.
Victim rights have been complied with by the Waukesha County District Attorneys Office.

Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to the charge.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the charge.


Court orders the following:
9 Months Jail - Straight-Time - FORTHWITH.
44 Days Credit.
Court will sentence to be served in Milwaukee County.

RESTITUTION:  $156.23 (to be paid to Neu's Building Center - restitution to be paid before costs or fines);
To be entered as a civil judgment.

COSTS:  $243
DRGOD:  $10
DNA SAMPLE AND SURCHARGE:  $ 200
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
To be paid - FORTHWITH - In Lieu of payment defendant to serve 5 days concurrent to the 9 months - 5 Days Credit - PAID IN FULL.
Detainer placed at: Milwaukee County Jail.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Court orders a cash bond in the amount of $100
CONDITIONS:
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.
Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness/business listed in the Criminal Complaint/Victim Identification Key.  
Defendant is not to disseminate any information in the Victim Identification Key, with the exception of their attorney.
Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  
Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.
